name: Tethered in the Middle of Nowhere
name_original: Tethered in the Middle of Nowhere
description:
Stay tethered to Emergency Life Support Tethers in order to survive in the cold vacuum of space. Collect Power Cells to re-establish your connection to Earth to win!

Made in Unreal Engine for the Utah Indie Games Jam. The theme was Reconnect.

All code, models, and textures were made by me during the jam. The only assets not created by me are the royalty-free music, sounds, and backdrop, sources listed below:

Music: Daddy_s_Music from Pixabay

Sounds: freesound.org

Backdrop: Free Space HDRs #1

Disclaimer: I made this game in under 48 hours with low amounts of sleep. If this has caused me to forget to credit you for an asset that I used, please let me know so I can update this page.
